participant_1.background:
My father doesn't approve of my music.
My parents are great, but they don't understand my lifestyle.
I collect cosplay props to bring my favorite characters to life.
I drive a Jeep Wrangler because it is a rugged vehicle that is perfect for my hobbies.
I'm retired and enjoy spending time with my black lab.

participant_2.background:
My most valued possession is my fitness tracker because it helps me to track my progress and stay motivated.
my mother is a dentist.
i love to bake cakes.
my favorite tv show is silicon valley.
I'm not very active on social media, but I like sharing pictures of my walks with my friends and family.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
Doing well, thanks! I'm just about to start baking a cake.
Oh, that sounds fun! What kind of cake are you making?
I'm making a chocolate cake. It's one of my favorite flavors.
My mom is a dentist. She's really good at her job.
That's great! I'm sure she's helped a lot of people.
She has. She's really passionate about her work.
That's awesome. I like people who are passionate about their jobs.
Me too. It makes work more enjoyable.
I agree. So, what do you do for fun?
I like to collect cosplay props. I like to bring my favorite characters to life.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been into cosplay, but it looks like a lot of fun.
It is! I love getting to dress up as my favorite characters.
I can imagine. It must be really exciting.
It is! I love seeing people's reactions when they see me.
I bet! It sounds like you have a lot of fun with your hobbies.
I do! I'm really lucky to have such great hobbies.
Me too. I love baking and walking
